skill_metadata.name: 3x3_product_grid
skill_metadata.description: Generate a 3x3 grid of product angles from a single product image. Creates 9 different views for use as reference images in downstream generation.
skill_metadata.author: MTRX Media
skill_metadata.purpose: Foundation skill - outputs feed into Aesthetic, Influencer, and Plain image skills

product_image.description: Single product image to analyze and recreate from multiple angles

website_url.description: Product page URL for additional context (brand name, product name)

step_1_product_analysis.description: Before generating the 3x3, analyze the product to create a detailed description block

product_overview.brand: Exact brand name as it appears on packaging
product_overview.product_type: Category (lip balm, supplement pouch, water bottle, etc.)
product_overview.packaging_type: Container type (tube, pouch, bottle, jar, tin, box)

shape_and_form.silhouette: Overall shape description (elongated tube, rounded jar, tear-drop bottle, flat pouch)
shape_and_form.proportions: Height to width ratio, any unique proportions
shape_and_form.cap_closure: Type of cap/closure (screw cap, flip cap, pump, squeeze tip, resealable)

materials_and_finish.primary_material: Main material (plastic, glass, foil, aluminum, etc.)
materials_and_finish.finish: Surface finish (matte, glossy, satin, metallic, soft-touch)
materials_and_finish.texture: Any tactile texture (smooth, ribbed, embossed, soft-squeeze)

colors.secondary_colors: Any additional colors with HEX codes
colors.color_distribution: Where each color appears on the product

branding_and_graphics.logo_placement: Where logo appears (front center, side, cap, etc.)
branding_and_graphics.text_on_packaging: ALL text exactly as it appears, spelled correctly

special_features.metallic_elements: Foil stamping, metallic inks, chrome details

light_interaction.refraction: If transparent, how light passes through

pos_1.name: Front Hero
pos_1.tilt: Slight upward tilt (5-10°) for heroic feel

pos_7.name: Top Down
pos_7.purpose: Shows cap/top and shape from above

step_3_prompt_template.description: Master prompt template for generating each angle
step_3_prompt_template.platform_prefix: Use the uploaded product image as exact reference for the product appearance.
step_3_prompt_template.prompt_template:
Professional product photography of {{product_description_block}}.

ANGLE: {{angle_description}}

PRODUCT POSITION: Product {{position_details}}, {{rotation_description}}. {{tilt_description}}.

BACKGROUND: Pure white infinity backdrop (#FFFFFF). Seamless, no visible horizon line. Clean commercial studio environment.

LIGHTING: Soft, diffused studio lighting. Key light from upper left at 45°. Fill light from right. Subtle rim light for edge definition. No harsh shadows. Product evenly lit with gentle gradients showing form.

PRODUCT FIDELITY (CRITICAL - NON-NEGOTIABLE):
• Reproduce the product EXACTLY as shown in reference image
• Preserve ALL logos, brand names, text, typography with 100% accuracy
• Text must be LEGIBLE, CORRECTLY SPELLED, and PROPERLY POSITIONED
• Colors must match reference exactly - no color shifts
• Materials and finishes must be accurate (matte stays matte, glossy stays glossy)
• Proportions must be exact - no stretching, squishing, or distortion
• Surface details (embossing, texture, seams) must be preserved

QUALITY:
• Ultra-high resolution, commercial photography quality
• Crisp focus across entire product
• No artifacts, no noise, no compression
• The product must look like a flawless photograph of the real physical item

ANTI-AI ARTIFACTS:
• No warped text or gibberish characters
• No melted or merged elements
• No impossible geometry
• No floating shadows or disconnected reflections
• No plastic/CGI smoothing - maintain real material properties
step_3_prompt_template.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted text, misspelled text, warped logo, wrong colors, stretched proportions, CGI look, plastic skin, colored background, gradient background, environmental elements, props, hands, people, lifestyle context, shadows on background, harsh shadows, overexposed, underexposed, noise, grain, artifacts

step_4_individual_prompts.description: Generate these 9 prompts with the product_description_block filled in

prompt_1_front_hero.angle_description: Front facing hero shot, straight on view
prompt_1_front_hero.tilt_description: Camera at product eye-level with subtle 5° upward angle for heroic presence

prompt_2_front_34_left.angle_description: Front 3/4 view, rotated 45° to the left
prompt_2_front_34_left.position_details: standing upright, slightly left of center
prompt_2_front_34_left.rotation_description: showing front face and left side simultaneously, 45° rotation
prompt_2_front_34_left.tilt_description: Camera at product eye-level, straight on

prompt_3_front_34_right.angle_description: Front 3/4 view, rotated 45° to the right
prompt_3_front_34_right.position_details: standing upright, slightly right of center
prompt_3_front_34_right.rotation_description: showing front face and right side simultaneously, 45° rotation
prompt_3_front_34_right.tilt_description: Camera at product eye-level, straight on

prompt_4_side_left.angle_description: Full left side profile view, 90° rotation
prompt_4_side_left.rotation_description: left side facing camera, front of product facing right
prompt_4_side_left.tilt_description: Camera at product eye-level, straight on

prompt_5_side_right.angle_description: Full right side profile view, 90° rotation
prompt_5_side_right.rotation_description: right side facing camera, front of product facing left
prompt_5_side_right.tilt_description: Camera at product eye-level, straight on

prompt_6_back.angle_description: Back view, 180° rotation showing back label
prompt_6_back.rotation_description: back of product facing camera, showing any back label or information
prompt_6_back.tilt_description: Camera at product eye-level, straight on

prompt_7_top_down.angle_description: Top-down bird's eye view, looking directly down at product
prompt_7_top_down.position_details: laying flat or standing, viewed from directly above
prompt_7_top_down.tilt_description: Camera directly above product, 90° downward angle

prompt_8_low_34_left.angle_description: Low angle 3/4 view from lower left, dramatic hero perspective
prompt_8_low_34_left.rotation_description: 45° rotation showing front and left side
prompt_8_low_34_left.tilt_description: Camera positioned below product, angled 20° upward, making product appear powerful and larger-than-life

prompt_9_low_34_right.angle_description: Low angle 3/4 view from lower right, dramatic hero perspective
prompt_9_low_34_right.rotation_description: 45° rotation showing front and right side
prompt_9_low_34_right.tilt_description: Camera positioned below product, angled 20° upward, making product appear powerful and larger-than-life

product_description_block.description: Detailed product description to be reused in all other skills

Brand name 'rhode' printed vertically in lowercase white sans-serif typography on front. Product name 'peptide lip treatment' in smaller white text below. Soft-touch matte finish, opaque plastic, subtle seam line running vertically.

grid_prompts.description: 9 prompts ready to paste into Nano Banana

grid_images.description: 9 generated images to use as references for other skills

setup: Upload original product image as reference
Set aspect ratio to 1:1 for grid consistency
Generate each of the 9 prompts separately
Save with consistent naming for easy reference
batch_workflow: Compile into reference folder for use in other skills

step_1_output.product_description_block:
Rhode Peptide Lip Treatment - premium skincare squeeze tube. Soft matte pink plastic (HEX #E8A0B0), elongated tapered silhouette approximately 4 inches tall, rounded squeeze tip applicator at top, flat oval base for standing. Material is soft-touch matte plastic, opaque, with subtle vertical seam lines.

BRANDING: 'rhode' logo printed vertically in lowercase white (HEX #FFFFFF) sans-serif typography (clean, modern, slightly rounded letterforms) on front center. Below logo: 'peptide lip treatment' in smaller white text, also lowercase. 'sheer' and shade name in smallest text near base.

The tube has gentle curves, narrowing toward the applicator tip. Surface catches light softly due to matte finish - no harsh reflections, gentle gradients show form. Shadow falls soft and diffused beneath product.
